text: Komla Afeke Dumor (3 October 1972 â€“ 18 January 2014) was a Ghanaian journalist. He was born in Accra, Ghana. His grandfather was Philip Gbeho, composer of the Ghanaian national anthem. As of June 2012, Dumor was the main presenter of the BBC World News programme Focus on Africa. Dumor died suddenly on 18 January 2014, in London after suffering cardiac arrest. ==References== ==Other websites== *About Us, BBC World Service *Focus and Network presenters, BBC World Service. *"Ghana: Komla Dumor Anchors BBC Africa Business Report",by Cephas, 21 August 2009, allAfrica. * Category:1972 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Journalists Category:BBC television presenters Category:People from Accra
title: Komla Dumor
